title: Alice Gear Aegis Expansion
overview: In the future, human beings were forced to escape from the earth due to the sudden attack of machine life forms "Weiss". During the escape by the spaceship group "Shard", mankind succeeds in developing a high-dimensional weapon "Alice Gear" that can counter Weiss. Women who excelled in "Emission", the aptitude for manipulating Alice Gears, were called "Actresses".
